titleStmt.title: The Popish Plot more fully discovered being a full account of a damnable and bloody design of murdering His Sacred Majesty : in an information lately taken by a member of the Honourable House of Commons : together with a brief relation of the horrid equivocation of a popish priest lately executed at Dublin in Ireland : published for the confirming of weak and doubting Protestants.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
